name: Banana Cornbread
author: Shaun Bowen
summary: Having vegan friends in college forced me to find some recipes that are friendly to their choice if I wanted to entertain. This recipe is delicious whether or not you are vegan. I've made it with almond, rice, soy, and regular milk and they are all very similar to identical in flavor and consistency.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Combine flour, cornmeal, milk, bananas, sugar, vegetable oil, baking powder, and salt together in a bowl until batter is smooth; pour into the prepared baking dish
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, about 30 minutes
